title: Embedded UAV Flight Controller (Final Year Project)
description: Engineered an embedded UAV flight controller integrating TinyML models for real-time anomaly detection and automated safety responses. Designed custom drone hardware in Fusion 360 and optimized aerodynamics for prototype testing.
